CustomField.description: When selected, the region, practice, group, or project records are updated with values from the backlog detail records directly, in addition to creating Backlog Calculation and Backlog Detail object records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Update the region, practice, group, or project records with values from the backlog detail records directly, in addition to creating Backlog Calculation and Backlog Detail object records.
CustomField.label: Copy Fields for Current Time Period
